pages.text: Use the Logistics Guide to teach maids to move items! Sneak right click binds the location where items are extract/stored for the logistics guide, and the sneak wheel modifies the current bindings. $(br2) opens the GUI, the maid's left and right will render containers to access, and the button in the lower right corner sets whether the maid will carry one item or a stack of items at a time.

pages.title: Logistics Guide
pages.text: (Remember to put it in your maid's bauble inventory after finish configuring)

pages.title: Smarter Logistics
pages.text: Putting a Filter or Craft Guide in the top left of the GUI grid will enable these extra features: $(br)$(l:maid_storage_manager/2_filter)Filter $(/l): the maid will follow the Filter instructions when moving items.$(br)$(l:maid_storage_manager/8_craft_guide)Craft Guide$(/l): The maid will take ingredients from the container in the ‘extract’ position, and then craft the corresponding product into the container in the ‘store’ position. $(br2)Tips: If the maid has more than one logistics guide, she will take turns performing each task.
